name: DeskPet (itch)
description:
A pet care simulator right on your desktop! Reduce stress and anxiety by caring for your pet, feeding and playing with them to bring your furry friend with you to work! Engage in two distinct minigames with your pet and watch them roam around their expansive room while they sit in your background to keep you company. Use puppy love to upgrade your room and create an even more enjoyable place for them! Make sure they're well taken care of or they may just run away.

Made with Unreal Engine 4.25
